attributes.action: Increase the length of sentence for anyone found in possession of a Firearm or Bladed Weapon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would act as a firmer deterrent to youths and criminals wanting to possess said items.

In America you would receive a life sentence for possessing an "Uzi" but seeing as we as a nation who do not allow firearms to be carried then this should be applied to all firearms and even knives.

You only carry one if you intend to harm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
